msg.name: sign_in_err
msg.desc: Error displayed when user is not signed in.

messagebundle.msg: This gadget lets you share and collaborate with friends on iGoogle. Sign in to use these features.

msg.name: social_access_err
msg.desc: Error displayed when user has not enabled opensocial feature.

messagebundle.msg: This gadget lets you share and collaborate with friends on iGoogle. Please adjust the gadget's settings to use these features.

msg.name: no_sensitive
msg.desc: To display to user message that on enabling opensocial feature no sensitive information will be shared.

messagebundle.msg: TravelGadget uses a new feature provided by Google called Open Social which allows you to make and share travel plans online with friends. To start, you need to adjust this gadget’s settings to enable it to access some of your profile information (your name, etc). No sensitive information will be shared.

msg.name: opensocial_is_new
msg.desc: To show information message to the user that opensocial is new and may have some bugs.

messagebundle.msg: Open Social is new, and there may still be some bugs in it. If it’s not working for you after you followed these directions, please
Click it, and in the form that appears just check the boxes and save. You should be ready to go!
iGoogle TravelGadget uses a new feature provided by Google called Open Social which allows you to plan your travel, online with friends. To start planing, please sign in to enable access.
If you are already signed in, please refresh the page in your browser to restore your access.
Open Social is new, and there may still be some bugs in it. If it’s not working for you after you followed these directions, please

iGoogle TravelGadget makes use of a new technology called Open Social which allows you to plan your travel online with your friends. Open Social features are being released to the public as the technology comes online — but right now, it looks like this feature is not available in your locale at this time. Please check back at a later date.
Click it, and in the form that appears just check the boxes and save. You should be ready to go!
Up top you should see a button like this:

messagebundle.msg: Either name or Address field is empty.
